reviewText: Very interesting read with a different twist. A must read for the fright night lovers. You want to keep reading to see what the outcome is.

What can I say of The Heart of the Beast?
Amazing story, great cast!
Really hoping to have the spanish version for passing on to the family.

Werewolves are the in thing once again and The Heart of the Beast monopolizes on this but it does it well. It's a charming sometimes funny tale and it's young actor and writer has done a terrific job!

"The Heart of the Beast" is a nice little story. The story set in the location Colorado with very interesting cast.
I like the character of David's Mom. He seemed to be at the bottom of the barrel already. That is, until his Mom, in an act of desperation, decides to send him to a retreat in Denver filled with nothing but girls.
Hope you will like it.

Knowing Blake personally I thought it was funny finding out he had made this. Sweet movie for only being 15

I have already bought this book and finaaly i can say that the introduction and the flow of story is really worth about this book and the best thing is the climax...overall characters are nicely written..very happy to have this book..thanks amazon
What's troubling about the book is that it's non-fiction. It really happened, and this once-sensitive and fragile young boy endured so much from people who should have valued and nurtured him.

This is a wonderful spun story written and produced by a 15 year old boy.
He thinks to be a soft, tender, loving boy but knows he has the past of a werewolf inside of him.
Rich in history and amazing imagination. Bringing about the ancient werewolf up to the new world admist a new age.
an ordinary boy with ordinary dreams is about to enter a marvellous world filed with unordinary feelings and events showing the way to an enlightened spirit. good to read. read to love.
"The Heart of the Beast" is a cute and emotionally stirring short tale that takes place in b in beautiful areas, with an mind expanding cast and a thought provoking moral ending.
"The Heart of the Beast" is a very good screenplay written by a 15 year old boy. I am amazed at the talent this boy has. I will watch out for his next work.
It is a good story written by a 15 year old boy. it is about a kidwolf. It is a wonderful story containing heart touching moments and description of beautiful places. A must buy product

DAVID BLADENFIELD is personaje that can be identified with life anyone we, the history is in colorado tell life typic young 15 years that live with his parents and his anger , he is inconformist young how any young this age today

un trabajo ejemplar. sus situaciones podran sucedernos a cualquiera en cualquier momento, y lo que ms me ha gustado es el modo en que se desencuelve el personaje. todo un referente para los tiempos actuales.
